üë®‚Äçüíª Projects

Linux workstation configuration with Ansible

I've created an Ansible playbook that configures a new installation of Linux desktop (Debian/Ubuntu or Fedora). This playbook configures system services, Gnome desktop settings, aliases, software, themes, and more!

This project can be found on Github: lowranceworks/config

Portfolio website

A 3D portfolio website written with Typescript, CSS and HTML. Currently hosted on Github pages.

This project can be found on Github: lowranceworks/portfolio
